import React, {useContext} from 'react' import './Products.css' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" const {products} = useContext(); export default function Products() { console.log("poiu--> ", products) return( <>
{ products.map((data) => (

{data.name}

{data.description}

Rs.{data.finalPrice} {data.strickPrice}{data.discount}% OFF
)) }
) }
